data.message: Fix path highlighting persistence in InterSphere: Fixed handleOpenPathFinder and handleClosePathFinder to preserve highlightedPath state. Path now stays bold/yellow after closing panel and when reopening.
data.task: Fix path highlighting persistence in InterSphere
data.outcome: Fixed handleOpenPathFinder and handleClosePathFinder to preserve highlightedPath state. Path now stays bold/yellow after closing panel and when reopening.
